name: Deathcar Loop Race
description:
Deathcar Loop Race is a grindy little game inspired by other loop and incremental games. 

Here you have to manage cour little car-workshop earn scraps and bunz and try to survive for 5 Tournaments(each with 3 diff styles of races).

You will loop the game as often as as you can to earn Bunz. With Bunz you improve your workshop and so on.

Game is in pre Alpha and right no, it needs many polish and ist just available in German language. A translation will follow in a few days.

Cheers Smokk
